articles.title: Visa Partners With Over 65 Crypto Platforms — Crypto-Linked Card Usage Soars Despite Price Volatility – Featured Bitcoin News - Bitcoin News
articles.description: Visa has now partnered with more than 65 crypto platforms and exchanges, and says crypto-linked card usage exceeded $2.5 billion in Q1.
